snippet: EULO-SIMONNIN--Mary, passed away in Bordeaux, France on February 11, 2016. Born on April 11, 1946 in Jersey City, NJ, Mary, nee Kulak, moved to New York City to pursue a career as a theater actress. She later worked at Time Magazine in sales and marketing. She met the great love of her life, Pierre Simonnin of Paris in the mid 70s and joined him in the Dordogne, France, in 1985. Her only child, Etienne, was born on February 7, 1987. Her husband passed away on January 25, 2013 in Perigueux where she resided until her passing. Condolences can be sent to L. Curry, P.O. Box 767, Church St. Station, NY, NY 10008-0767. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  EULO, SIMONNIN, MARY
